languages.text: "Напомни свечку поставить в вашем храме. Помолюсь, чтобы смерть заикалась почаще".
"Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."
languages.original_text: "Напомни свечку поставить в вашем храме. Помолюсь, чтобы смерть заикалась почаще".

traits.locale_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll ask death to stammer more often."

"Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

languages.text: "Erinnert mich bitte daran, in Eurem Tempel keine Kerze zu entzünden. Ich werde den Tod bitten müssen, öfter zu stottern."
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert mich bitte daran, in Eurem Tempel keine Kerze zu entzünden. Ich werde den Tod bitten müssen, öfter zu stottern."

languages.text: « Rappelez-moi d'allumer un cierge dans votre temple, à l'occasion. Je ne serais pas fâchée que la mort bégaie un peu plus souvent. »
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

traits.locale_text: « Rappelez-moi d'allumer un cierge dans votre temple, à l'occasion. Je ne serais pas fâchée que la mort bégaie un peu plus souvent. »

languages.text: «Recuérdeme que encienda una vela en su templo. Tengo que pedirle a la muerte que tartamudee más a menudo».
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

traits.locale_text: «Recuérdeme que encienda una vela en su templo. Tengo que pedirle a la muerte que tartamudee más a menudo».

languages.text: 「あなたの神殿でロウソクを灯すよう、思い出させてください。死がもっと頻繁にやってくるよう頼むために」
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの神殿でロウソクを灯すよう、思い出させてください。死がもっと頻繁にやってくるよう頼むために」

languages.text: “记得提醒我在你的圣殿里点根蜡烛。我想祈祷一下，希望死亡能多磨蹭一阵子。”
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

traits.locale_text: “记得提醒我在你的圣殿里点根蜡烛。我想祈祷一下，希望死亡能多磨蹭一阵子。”

languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."

languages.text: "Hatırlat da senin şu tapınakta bir mum yakayım. Ölümden daha sık duraksamasını istemem gerek."
languages.original_text: "Remind me to light a candle in that temple of yours. I'll have to ask death to stammer more often."
